posts.message:
ok this is out of IT but it's really important if you are living abroad ... 
many people if they see you stressed out they will just tell you: 
"Why you don't do Yoga" and they start explaining how useful it is and how it makes you relax Bla Bla Bla... 

DON'T DO IT and I will tell you why. Because Simply Yoga is "Buddhist Prayer" i'm not giving a Fatwa here :) but it's useful to know and you can ask a Shikh if you need a Fatwa :)

posts.description: We're reading today that Estonia is implementing a new education program that will have 100 percent of publicly educated students learning to write code.

posts.caption: ibm.com
posts.description: Scientists from IBM Research have created the world’s smallest magnetic memory bit, reducing the number of atoms needed to store one bit of data from one million to 12, vastly increasing storage data density.

posts.message: Call US, Canada, Mexico For free :) they give you 30 Min. free everyday: http://bobsled.com/#!/home
posts.caption: bobsled.com
posts.description: Communicate like you're all on the same network! Bobsled makes it easy to call and message with your friends for free using any device, service or carrier. All you need is an Internet connection.
